description: a(n) is smallest integral radius of circle centered at (0,0) having 8n-4 lattice points on its circumference; a(n)/2 is smallest half-integral radius circle centered at (1/2,0) having 4n-2 lattice points; a(n)/3 is smallest third-integral radius circle centered at (1/3,0) having 2n-1 lattice points.
